description: Welcome to Corbeau by Mosaic – one of Port Moody’s most sought-after communities! This bright and modern 2-bedroom, 2-bath end-unit townhome offers exceptional natural light, privacy, and a beautifully functional layout. The open-concept main level flows seamlessly from the stylish kitchen with stainless steel appliances into spacious living and dining areas, and out to your private walk-out patio and fully fenced yard — perfect for entertaining, relaxing, or letting kids and pets play. Tucked away in a serene, greenbelt setting surrounded by mature trees and meticulously landscaped grounds, this home feels like a retreat — just a short walk to the Evergreen SkyTrain, Newport Village, Rocky Point, and more. Enjoy true tranquility & connection in one of Port Moody’s most desirable locations
